questions.question: The speed of sound in air at 20°C is

explanations.a: Correct – The speed of sound in air at 20°C is approximately 344 m/s.
explanations.b: Close, but slightly lower than the standard value at 20°C.
explanations.d: Too low for typical air temperature.

questions.question: Number of waves per second is called

explanations.a: Amplitude is the height of the wave, not the count.
explanations.b: Correct – Frequency is the number of wave cycles per second.
explanations.c: Velocity refers to the speed of the wave.
explanations.d: Wavelength is the length of one complete wave.
